short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arcane Wallpaper turn new tab to Arcane League of Legends background. Arcane wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Arcane wallpapers each time you open a new tab.  
2. Randomize Arcane backgrounds or mark your favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Built-in search bar powered by Google.  
4. Quick access to your email and social media platforms.  
5. Automatically display the current date and time.  
6. Create and manage tasks using the built-in Notes feature.  
7. Access your most visited websites with a single click.  
8. Navigate your bookmarks effortlessly.  
9. Add websites to a Shortcut panel for easy and quick access.  
10. Instant access to Google apps.  
11. Explore and apply new themes with a single click.  
12. Share content easily on social media platforms.  
13. Download your favorite wallpapers quickly.  
14. Direct access to play games.  
15. Enable fun animations such as snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in your Arcane new tab.
